headline: New Study Finds 84% of Security Professionals Experienced an API Security Incident in the Past Year
summary: Akamai Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cloud company that powers and protects life online, today announced new research showing that while API attacks are rising, visibility into API risks that open doors for attackers is declining. Now in its third year, the API Security Impact Study (formerly the API Security Disconnect) explores the state of API protection based on a survey of 1,207 security leaders and practitioners across the United States, United Kingdom, and Germany.
